headline.main: MOSCOW RIDICULES NAZI 'WITHDRAWAL'; Prisoners Say German Orders Were to Hold 'at Any Price' the Points Since Lost

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Aug. 31 -- The Germans are talking a lot about "elastic defense" to cover up their numerous defeats in Russia, and even some Allied commentators have suggested that the Germans are "pulling out" of the eastern Ukraine. These theories are contradicted by facts.
